item.title: [Lc]133克隆图
item.description: 题目 图的定义如下： // Definition for a Node. class Node { public: int val; vector<Node*> neighbors; Node() { val = 0; neighbors = vector<Node*>(); } Node(int _val) { val = _val; neighbors = vector<Node*>(); } Node(int _val, vector<Node*> _neighbors) { val = _val; neighbors = _neighbors; } }; 题解 两个方法。DFS，BFS 1. DFS
